name: dc dice bag and tray
notes:
***dc dice bag and rolling tray crochet pattern***

pattern is available for free on my blog, or download the ad-free version here for a small fee.

**free crochet pattern published on my blog:** 
https://greenfoxfarmsdesigns.com/dc-dice-bag-free

* awesome dice bag is easy and fun to make!

* carry your dice in style in this small or medium dice bag!

* bonus! --> the dice bag does double duty as a rolling tray!

* makes a great gift for the board gamer or role player in your life!

* playing with dice on the go is now a cinch.

* simple drawstring closure is easy to open and close.

* just open the tray all the way up and the natural sides allow you to roll the dice without chasing them!

* small size is great for board games.

* medium size is great for dice games and role play games!

*learn to create a magic ring with dc video tutorial.* 

click here to join my facebook community for exclusive discounts, cals, giveaways and more! --> [join the fb group!][1]


**materials:** 
worsted weight yarn (120 yds) 
i recommend red heart super saver 
g 4.0 mm hook 
yarn needle
scissors

**stitch key:** 
st(s) – stitch(es)
space – sp(s)
sl st – slip stitch
ch – chain
sc - single crochet
dc – double crochet 
incr – incr by 2 dc in same st
yo – yarn over
fo – fasten off 

**green fox farms designs original crochet pattern!**

i am here to help if you have any questions! feel free to send me a message through my blog or social media (fb & ig links below)!

this pattern is **free**, but has not been tested by anyone besides myself. please feel free to share any questions or comments you may have! i welcome your feedback!

this pattern is my intellectual property. you are welcome to make as many as you like, sell them, give them away, etc. you may not sell, or alter and claim as your own this pattern. this pattern may not be mass produced, it is for individual use only. you may not use my photographs.

if you want to share this pattern online, you must only share a link to my blog. you may not copy and paste my text / the pattern to another site. thank you for respecting my work. :)

thank you! 
lisa fox
